dmca.title: Notice of Infringement
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal
<http://www.theplanet.com/legal> .

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


________________________________

From: Fashion Glow [mailto:copyright@fashionglow.com] 
Posted At: Friday, May 12, 2006 10:20 AM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: Notice of Infringement
Subject: Notice of Infringement


RE: ResellerRatings.com 
 
It has come to our attention that ResellerRatings.com, a site hosted by
The Planet, is using service and/or trademark(s) proprietary to
FASHIONGLOW. FASHIONGLOW has further notified ResellerRatings that it is
not authorized to use its name, hyperlinking to its website or libels
about FASHIONGLOW and its affiliates ( ie: SHOPCHIC) nor  to display its
marks at:
 
http://www.resellerratings.com/seller12707.html
 
We believe THE PLANET respects the rights of both its users and the
owners and rights holders of intellectual property.  Accordingly, and in
accordance with the PLANET Terms of Service, we request that THE PLANET
expeditiously remove or disable access to the mark(s) in question.
PLEASE BE ADVISED THAT UNLESS THE CONTENT IN QUESTION IS REMOVED, OR
ACCESS TO THE CONTENT IS DISABLED, WITHIN FORTY-EIGHT (48) HOURS,
FASHIONGLOW INTENDS TO IMMEDIATELY CONSIDER LEGAL ACTION. 
 
 
 ResellerRatings.com has responded to our request to remove the contents
in question by a REBUTTAL . Consequently, we request that The Planet
contributes to enforce FASHIONGLOW's rights according to the
Intellectual Property Infringement Policy or any copyright law.
We wish to thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation and
assistance in this matter. 
 
 
Eleni Simmons
Copyright Agent
E-mail: copyright@FashionGlow.com 
 
 
FASHIONGLOW/ SHOPCHIC
8721 Santa Monica Blvd. Ste 1058
Los Angeles CA 90069
(323) 297-2576
 
cc: Bruce Soenberg Esq.
Prater & Soenberg LLP.
